results.name: Least common multiple of all parts in Zeckendorf representation of n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384 (first 10000 terms from Reinhard Zumkeller)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Zeckendorf Representation
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's.
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; local j;
else for j from 2 while F(j+1)<=n do od;
mathematica: t = Fibonacci /@ Range@ 21; Table[LCM @@ If[MemberQ[t, n], {n}, Most@ MapAt[# + 1 &, Abs@ Differences@ FixedPointList[# - First@ Reverse@ TakeWhile[t, Function[k, # >= k]] &, n], -1]], {n, 61}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 17 2016 *)
program: a106530 = foldr lcm 1 . a035516_row -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 10 2013
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 08 2005
